label: 尺八
本: Edo Culture: Daily Life and Diversions in Urban Japan, 1600-1868 . University of Hawai'i Press . 1997
説明文: An end-blown bamboo flute often associated with the Fuke sect of Zen Buddhism. The standard instrument is 1.8 feet in length and has five finger holes (four in front, one in the back).［普化［宗］、禅］
